513970.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 513970
In-book reference  : Book 35, Hadith 970
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 35, Hadith 970
513970.text: Yahya related to me from Malik from Ibn Shihab from Said ibn al- Musayyab and from Abu Salama ibn Abd ar-Rahman ibn Awf that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, decreed for partners the right of preemption in property which had not been divided up. When boundaries had been fixed between them, then there was no right of pre-emption.

3502.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 3502
In-book reference  : Book 35, Hadith 502
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 35, Hadith 502
3502.text: Malik said, "That is the sunna about which there is no dispute among us."

513980.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 513980
In-book reference  : Book 35, Hadith 980
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 35, Hadith 980
513980.text: Malik said that he heard that Said ibn al-Musayyab, when asked about pre-emption and whether there was a sunna in it, said, "Yes. Pre-emption is in houses and land, and it is only between partners."

513990.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 513990
In-book reference  : Book 35, Hadith 990
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 35, Hadith 990
513990.text: Malik related to me that he heard the like of that from Sulayman ibn Yasar.

514000.reference:
Reference  : Muwatta Malik 514000
In-book reference  : Book 35, Hadith 000
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 35, Hadith 000
514000.text: Yahya said that Malik related from Muhammad ibn Umara from Abu Bakr ibn Hazm that Uthman ibn Affan said, "When boundaries are fixed in land, there is no pre-emption in it. There is no pre-emption in a well or in male palm trees. "
